biography_text: RATCLIFFE, John, a Representative from Texas; born in Chicago, Cook County, Ill., October 20, 1965; B.A., University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, Ind., 1987; J.D., Southern Methodist University, Dallas, Tex., 1989; lawyer, private practice; professor; United States attorney for the Eastern District of Texas, 2007-2008; mayor of Heath, Tex., 2004-2012; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).
